code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import filter from'./slices/filterSlice';import items from'./slices/itemsSlice';import cart from'./slices/cartSlice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';export var store=configureStore({reducer:{filter:filter,items:items,cart:cart}});export var useAppDispatch=function useAppDispatch(){return useDispatch();};
